testcase.name: Validate visiting two different domains
testcase.failure:
`cy.visit()` failed because you are attempting to visit a URL that is of a different origin.
You likely forgot to use `cy.origin()`:
`cy.visit('http://www.webdriveruniversity.com/')` `<commands targeting http://www.webdriveruniversity.com go here>`
`cy.origin('https://automationteststore.com', () => {` ` cy.visit('https://automationteststore.com/')` ` <commands targeting https://automationteststore.com go here>` `})`
The new URL is considered a different origin because the following parts of the URL are different:
> protocol, superdomain
You may only `cy.visit()` same-origin URLs within a single test.
The previous URL you visited was:
> 'http://www.webdriveruniversity.com'
You're attempting to visit this URL:
> 'https://automationteststore.com'
https://on.cypress.io/cannot-visit-different-origin-domain CypressError: `cy.visit()` failed because you are attempting to visit a URL that is of a different origin.
